datasets.name: d7dbbe0c
queryLines:
WITH sales_with_month AS (
    SELECT 
        s1.item_total,
        s1.quantity,
        s1.product_id,
        EXTRACT(MONTH FROM s.sale_date) AS sale_month
    FROM my_catalog.my_schema.salesitem s1
    JOIN my_catalog.my_schema.sales s 
        ON s1.sale_id = s.sale_id
)

SELECT DISTINCT 
    c.channel,
    c.description,
    c1.country AS Cuscountry,
    c1.signup_date,
    p.brand,
    p.color,
    p.size,
    p.gender,
    p.catalog_price,
    p.cost_price,
    s.total_amount,
    s.discounted,
    s1.item_total,
    s1.discount_applied,
    s1.discount_percent,
    s1.discounted AS discounted_item,
    s1.channel_campaigns,
    s1.item_id,
    s1.unit_price,
    s1.original_price,
    s.sale_id,
    s.customer_id,
    s.sale_date,
    c1.age_range,
    s1.product_id,
    s1.quantity,
    p.product_name,
    p.category,
    st.stock_quantity,

    -- Monthly Average Target Sales & Quantity
    ROUND(AVG(sales_with_month.item_total) 
        OVER (PARTITION BY s1.product_id, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM s.sale_date)), 2) AS target_sales,
    
    ROUND(AVG(sales_with_month.quantity) 
        OVER (PARTITION BY s1.product_id, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM s.sale_date)), 0) AS target_quantity

FROM my_catalog.my_schema.channel c
JOIN my_catalog.my_schema.sales s 
    ON c.channel = s.channel
JOIN my_catalog.my_schema.customer c1 
    ON s.customer_id = c1.customer_id
JOIN my_catalog.my_schema.salesitem s1 
    ON s.sale_id = s1.sale_id
JOIN my_catalog.my_schema.product p 
    ON s1.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN my_catalog.my_schema.stock st 
    ON p.product_id = st.product_id
JOIN sales_with_month
    ON sales_with_month.product_id = s1.product_id 
   AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM s.sale_date) = sales_with_month.sale_month
WHERE c.channel IS NOT NULL
  AND s.sale_id IS NOT NULL
  AND s.customer_id IS NOT NULL
  AND s1.product_id IS NOT NULL
  AND p.product_id IS NOT NULL
  AND st.stock_quantity IS NOT NULL;

datasets.name: 13f98e0c
queryLines:
SELECT 
    p.product_id,
    p.product_name,
    SUM(s1.quantity) AS total_quantity_sold
FROM my_catalog.my_schema.european_fashion_store_salesitem s1
JOIN my_catalog.my_schema.european_fashion_store_product p 
    ON s1.product_id = p.product_id
GROUP BY p.product_id, p.product_name
ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC
LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: 2233a01a
queryLines:
SELECT 
    p.product_id,
    p.product_name,
    p.catalog_price,
    p.cost_price,
    (p.catalog_price - p.cost_price) AS profit_margin
FROM my_catalog.my_schema.european_fashion_store_product p
ORDER BY profit_margin DESC
LIMIT 10;

datasets.name: 2e2324d5
queryLines:
WITH customer_sales_count AS (
    SELECT 
        customer_id,
        COUNT(DISTINCT sale_id) AS total_sales
    FROM my_catalog.my_schema.european_fashion_store_sales
    GROUP BY customer_id
)

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN total_sales = 1 THEN 'New Customer'
        ELSE 'Repeat Customer'
    END AS customer_type,
    COUNT(*) AS count_customers
FROM customer_sales_count
GROUP BY customer_type;
